resources.string: Affirmations
I can pass Kotlin Exam.
Programming is fun.
Each day is a new chance to learn more, discover more enjoy more.
I have so much to be grateful for.
I am resilient, no hardship can kneel me.
A smile on the face keeps everyone happy
Gotta work out, instead of sitting on a chair all day.
Healthy lifestyle is an investment for long life.
Positivity calls for more positivity, and vice versa.
Eternal happiness is boring. Balance is key in my life.
The fate is more or less mine, and mine only.
Relationships are important. Gotta keep them alive.
The day when I no longer feel stressed about money will come, or I will make it come.
We are all one in this planet, I do not tolerate separatism.
Science is key in answering my biggest questions in life.
Curiosity keep me alive and thirsty for more in life.
Understanding different opinions than mine is a crucial skill that I lack. Must be no more.
Home for me is not where I was born, but where I feel home. The planet is my home.
I will travel around the world by bike.
I will create something that benefits the world.
